name: Dungeons & Tanks
description:
Wander dungeons in a tank! Be careful because many monsters will try to catch you and posess. One miss and you loose.

But don't worry. You have a big gun to shoot at ghosts. Some of them might be hit more than one time.

Watch for your ammo and energy. In the dungeons you might find more ammo and special balls of energy to boost your life.
